text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..1Medication repeat information
extension 0..*ExtensionSlice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:numberOfRepeatPrescriptionsAllowed 0..1ExtensionNumber of repeat prescriptions authorised
url 1..1uri"numberOfRepeatPrescriptionsAllowed"
valueUnsignedInt:valueUnsignedInt 1..1unsignedIntNumber of issues authorised
extension:numberOfRepeatPrescriptionsIssued 0..1ExtensionNumber of repeat prescriptions issued
url 1..1uri"numberOfRepeatPrescriptionsIssued"
valueUnsignedInt:valueUnsignedInt 0..1unsignedIntNumber of issues issued
extension:authorisationExpiryDate 0..1ExtensionRepeat prescription review date
url 1..1uri"authorisationExpiryDate"
valueDateTime:valueDateTime 0..1dateTimeRepeat review date
url 1..1uri"https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/Extension-CareConnect-MedicationRepeatInformation-1"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: Extension-CareConnect-MedicationRepeatInformation-1
description: Indicates the specific repeat information of a medication item.

element.definition: Medication repeat information.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url
